caption: In a dimly lit room, a young man was conversing with his mother. The mother appeared to be reprimanding the young man, but he seemed helpless and asked his mother to explain the reason. His mother didn't seem entirely satisfied but refrained from saying more. Then the young man gave some instructions to his mother, and their relationship still appeared intact.Meanwhile, in another setting, seemingly within a grand hall undergoing renovation, a man dressed in red was explaining something to another woman in red attire. It seemed he was elaborating on the reasons behind the renovation of the grand hall.
